features.name: Public Portfolio & Landing
features.description: Responsive homepage showcasing projects, services, and contact form with email delivery.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Full-featured management console: clients, projects, tasks, time tracking, messaging, campaigns, user management, backups.

features.name: Client Portal
features.description: Self-service portal for clients to view projects, billing, estimates, and exchange messages.

features.name: Developer Template Library
features.description: 33 production-ready code templates across 10 categories with live preview, usage notes, and search.

features.name: Compliance Knowledge Base
features.description: 12 regulatory frameworks with cross-mapping, evidence tracking, OSCAL catalogs, and implementation guidance.

features.name: Authentication & RBAC
features.description: JWT-based auth with admin/user roles, activity logging, and password management.

features.name: Campaign & Messaging Engine
features.description: Segment-based bulk messaging, email templates, read-tracking, and campaign analytics.

features.name: Backup & Restore
features.description: On-demand JSON backups, downloadable exports, and one-click restoration with safety snapshots.

features.name: Demo Data Generator
features.description: One-click demo population with realistic clients, projects, messages, and campaigns. Selective or full cleanup.

features.name: Docs-as-Code
features.description: Auto-generated, searchable documentation page that stays in sync with the codebase on every deploy.

templates.title: Contact Form with Validation
templates.description: Complete contact form with client and server-side validation, error handling, and user feedback.

templates.title: JWT Authentication Middleware
templates.description: Express middleware for JWT token validation with role-based access control.

templates.title: CRUD Database Model
templates.description: Generic CRUD operations class for SQLite with better-sqlite3, easily adaptable to any table.

templates.title: RESTful API Controller Pattern
templates.description: Standard REST API controller with proper HTTP methods, error handling, and validation.

templates.title: API Client Wrapper
templates.description: Simplified fetch wrapper with authentication, error handling, and request/response interceptors.

templates.title: Reusable Modal Component
templates.description: Flexible modal dialog component with customizable content, animations, and accessibility features.

templates.title: Toast Notification System
templates.description: Lightweight notification system with multiple types, auto-dismiss, and animations.

templates.title: Loading State Manager
templates.description: Manage loading states for buttons, forms, and page sections with consistent UI feedback.

templates.title: Data Table with Search & Filter
templates.description: Feature-rich data table with search, sort, filter, and pagination capabilities.

templates.title: Email Service with Templates
templates.description: Nodemailer email service with HTML templates and fallback plain text.

templates.title: LocalStorage Manager
templates.description: Type-safe localStorage wrapper with JSON serialization, expiration, and error handling.

templates.title: Validation Utility Functions
templates.description: Collection of common validation functions for forms, APIs, and data processing.

templates.title: Form State Manager
templates.description: Centralized form state management with validation, dirty state tracking, and error handling.

templates.title: Debounce & Throttle Utilities
templates.description: Performance optimization utilities for rate-limiting function calls.

templates.title: Date & Time Utilities
templates.description: Common date/time formatting and manipulation functions.

templates.title: Role-Based Access Control Middleware
templates.description: Express middleware for RBAC with role hierarchy, permission checks, and audit logging. Maps to SOC 2 CC6.1, ISO 27001 A.8.2, HIPAA Access Controls.

templates.title: Chain-Hashed Audit Logger
templates.description: Tamper-evident audit log with SHA-256 hash chaining. Each entry links to the previous via cryptographic hash, satisfying SOC 2 CC7.2, ISO 27001 A.8.15, and HIPAA audit requirements.

templates.title: AES-256-GCM Field Encryption Service
templates.description: Encrypt sensitive database fields at rest using AES-256-GCM with per-field IV and auth tags. Maps to GDPR Art. 32, HIPAA Â§164.312(a)(2)(iv), PCI DSS Req 3.

templates.title: PII Data Masking Utility
templates.description: Mask or redact personally identifiable information in logs, exports, and displays. Supports SSN, email, phone, credit card, and custom patterns. Maps to GDPR Art. 25, HIPAA Safe Harbor.

templates.title: Breach Notification Workflow Engine
templates.description: Multi-framework breach notification engine with deadline tracking for GDPR (72h), HIPAA (60d), DORA (4h), and NIS 2 (24h). Classifies severity, routes to authorities, and generates timelines.

templates.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Middleware
templates.description: TOTP (RFC 6238) and WebAuthn/FIDO2 MFA middleware with recovery codes, rate-limiting lockout (PCI DSS 8.3.4), and 8-hour session window. Drop-in Express middleware for protecting admin routes.

templates.title: Configurable Session Timeout Manager
templates.description: Framework-compliant session timeout middleware with idle + absolute timeouts, configurable profiles (standard/sensitive/critical), grace-period warnings, and audit-logged auto-logout.

templates.title: HIPAA Minimum Necessary PHI Filter
templates.description: Role-based PHI field filtering implementing HIPAA Â§164.502(b) Minimum Necessary Standard. Defines the 18 Safe Harbor identifiers, provides per-role access profiles, and logs every PHI access for audit compliance.

templates.title: GDPR Granular Consent Manager
templates.description: Per-purpose consent tracking implementing GDPR Articles 6, 7, 13, 17, 20, and 21. Tracks consent versions, withdrawal history, legal basis, and generates Kantara-specification consent receipts for audit evidence.

templates.title: PCI DSS Card Data Sanitizer
templates.description: PCI DSS 4.0.1 compliant PAN detection, masking (first-6/last-4), truncation, and tokenization. Detects 7 card brands via Luhn validation, scrubs PANs from free-text fields, and ensures card data never reaches logs.

templates.title: Sustainable Balanced Scorecard (SBSC)
templates.description: Strategic matrix integrating Financial, Customer, Internal Process, and Learning & Growth perspectives with sustainability KPIs, AI automation vectors, and servant leadership practices.

templates.title: Circular Supply Chain Workflow
templates.description: Six-phase circular economy workflow: Regenerative Sourcing â†’ Circular Design â†’ GreenOps Manufacturing â†’ PaaS Distribution â†’ Reverse Logistics â†’ Remanufacturing.

templates.title: Triple Bottom Line (TBL) P&L
templates.description: Profit-People-Planet integrated P&L with baseline vs projected metrics, AI-driven financial modeling, and servant leadership valuation rationale.

templates.title: Purpose-Driven Marketing Audit
templates.description: Five-phase audit framework: Purpose Alignment, Impact Verification, Inclusive Storytelling, Ethical Personalization, and Continuous Sentiment Analysis.

templates.title: Servant Leadership 1-on-1 & Review
templates.description: Structured 1-on-1 coaching agenda (5 segments) plus a 5-competency performance evaluation rubric scoring empowerment, psychological safety, growth, inclusion, and ethics.

templates.title: Sustainable SDLC & GreenOps
templates.description: Five-phase software development lifecycle embedding energy-efficient coding, Content Engineering, and environmental performance metrics alongside traditional quality gates.

templates.title: AI Governance & ESG Compliance (NIST AI RMF)
templates.description: Operationalizes the four NIST AI RMF functions (Govern, Map, Measure, Manage) with AI agent enablement, servant leadership accountability, and OSCAL documentation integration.

frameworks.name: CMMC
frameworks.description: CMMC 2.0 ensures that Defense Industrial Base (DIB) companies implement cybersecurity practices to protect Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) and Federal Contract Information (FCI). It aligns directly with NIST SP 800-171 requirements and adds third-party certification for Level 2 contractors. CMMC is a pass/fail requirement for DoD contracts.

frameworks.name: DORA
frameworks.description: DORA harmonizes ICT risk management rules across the EU financial sector, ensuring all participants can withstand, respond to, and recover from ICT-related disruptions and threats. It explicitly covers third-party ICT providers and mandates resilience testing including TLPT. DORA fills a critical gap by moving beyond traditional financial risk to address operational technology risk.

frameworks.name: GDPR
frameworks.description: The GDPR enforces rigorous data privacy laws across the EU, applying extraterritorially to any global organization processing personal data of EU residents. It champions 'Privacy by Design and by Default,' mandating that data protection is integrated into software from inception. It uses a risk-based approach rather than prescriptive technology mandates.

frameworks.name: HIPAA
frameworks.description: HIPAA establishes the definitive federal standard for protecting sensitive patient data. The Security Rule establishes national standards for protecting electronic Protected Health Information (ePHI). Covered Entities and Business Associates must implement Administrative, Physical, and Technical Safeguards. Specifications are designated as Required (R) or Addressable (A) - addressable does NOT mean optional.

frameworks.name: ISO 27001
frameworks.description: ISO/IEC 27001 is the international gold standard for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an Information Security Management System (ISMS). It requires a systemic approach to managing sensitive company information through continuous risk assessment and risk treatment. The 2022 revision consolidated 114 controls into 93 across 4 domains.

frameworks.name: ISO 42001
frameworks.description: ISO 42001 is the world's first international certifiable management system standard for Artificial Intelligence. It provides a structured framework for organizations to manage AI responsibly, addressing the unique challenges of AI such as transparency, explainability, fairness, and the ethical use of data. It follows the ISO High-Level Structure (HLS), making it integrable with ISO 27001 and ISO 9001. Annex A contains 38 controls across the AI lifecycle.

frameworks.name: NIS 2
frameworks.description: NIS 2 dramatically expands the scope of EU cybersecurity regulation from the original NIS Directive. It covers 18 critical sectors, introduces management liability, and mandates specific cybersecurity risk management measures (Article 21). It establishes a multi-million euro fine regime modeled on GDPR.

frameworks.name: NIST 800-171 Rev 3
frameworks.description: NIST SP 800-171 Rev 3 specifies security requirements for protecting the confidentiality of Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) when it resides in nonfederal systems and organizations. Revision 3 aligns the requirements more closely with NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5 and restructures requirements using the 800-53 control family structure. It is the basis for CMMC Level 2 assessments and is mandated by DFARS 252.204-7012 for defense contractors.

frameworks.name: NIST 800-53
frameworks.description: NIST SP 800-53 Rev 5 provides a comprehensive catalog of security and privacy controls for federal information systems and organizations. It serves as the foundational control framework for FISMA compliance, FedRAMP authorization, and is widely adopted across government and private sectors. The framework covers 20 control families spanning management, operational, and technical safeguards.

frameworks.name: NIST AI RMF
frameworks.description: The NIST AI RMF provides a voluntary framework for managing risks associated with AI systems throughout their lifecycle. It promotes trustworthy AI by addressing validity, reliability, safety, security, explainability, privacy, fairness, and accountability. The framework uses four core functions: Govern, Map, Measure, and Manage. It is technology-agnostic and applicable to all AI system types.

frameworks.name: PCI DSS
frameworks.description: PCI DSS provides a rigorous technical and operational baseline for protecting Cardholder Data (CHD) and Sensitive Authentication Data (SAD). Version 4.0.1 emphasizes continuous security, risk-based customization via the Customized Approach, and robust authentication. It applies to any entity that stores, processes, or transmits payment card information.

frameworks.name: SOC 2
frameworks.description: SOC 2 is the prevailing compliance standard for technology service providers, SaaS platforms, and cloud-native organizations. Developed by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA), it evaluates an organization's information systems against the Trust Services Criteria (TSC). Unlike prescriptive frameworks, SOC 2 is principles-based - it evaluates whether controls effectively protect systems, giving flexibility to design controls that fit operational maturity.
